CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By regulating the composition of the electrondeficient units , broad absorptions of the random copolymers , P2-P6 were observed from 400 to 900 nm compared to the parent polymers , P1 and P7 , indicating that incorporating two different electron - deficient units into polymer backbone is an effective method to broaden the absorption band and control the optical band gap.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P2-P6 |
| P7 |

The entities in the paragraph are the polymers P1, P2-P6, and P7.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P2-P6 |
| P7 |

The entities in the paragraph that refer clearly to material names are "P1", "P2-P6", and "P7". Other entities such as "electron-deficient units" and "polymer backbone" do not refer to specific materials and are not included in the table.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: By regulating the composition of the electrondeficient units , broad absorptions of the random copolymers , P2-P6 were observed from 400 to 900 nm compared to the parent polymers , P1 and P7 , indicating that incorporating two different electron - deficient units into polymer backbone is an effective method to broaden the absorption band and control the optical band gap.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| composition of electron-deficient units |
| broad absorptions of random copolymers P2-P6 |
| absorption band |
| optical band gap |
| composition of polymer backbone (implied, not explicitly stated) |
| absorptions of parent polymers P1 and P7 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| composition of electron-deficient units |
| absorption band |
| optical band gap |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "Broad absorptions of random copolymers P2-P6" and "comparison to parent polymers P1 and P7" describe the observations made, but not material properties. "Incorporating two different electron-deficient units into polymer backbone" is a method or process, not a property.
